physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a high point view of Singapore from Fort canning. In the center of the photograph
 there is a long
 white bunker structure. On its left
 there is a cannon. In the background
 there are numerous buildings surrounding a reservoir near the port. In the distance
 there are several ships harboured near the coast. The photograph is slightly folded at the top. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Singapore from Fort Canning
metadata.materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a high point view of Singapore from Fort canning. In the center of the photograph, there is a long, white bunker structure. On its left, there is a cannon. In the background, there are numerous buildings surrounding a reservoir near the port. In the distance, there are several ships harboured near the coast. The photograph is slightly folded at the top. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_1: aerial views forts coastal settlements port settlements
